title: How to Make Dried Cranberry Compote

steps.headline: Mix the ingredients in a heavy-based saucepan.
Bring to the boil.
steps.description: Cover and remove from the heat.

steps.headline: Leave the boiled mixture to stand to allow the cranberries to absorb the liquid in the pan.
steps.description: This will take about one hour.

steps.headline: Place in the refrigerator to chill.

text: Mix the ingredients in a heavy-based saucepan.  Bring to the boil. Cover and remove from the heat. Leave the boiled mixture to stand to allow the cranberries to absorb the liquid in the pan. This will take about one hour. Place in the refrigerator to chill. It should be served cold.
